testcase.name: As A User, I want to Register and have Cermati account
testcase.system-out: Given I already open my browser.............................................passed And navigate to cermati registration page...................................passed When I input my email.......................................................passed And I input my phone number.................................................passed And I input my password.....................................................passed And I confirm my password...................................................passed And I input my first name...................................................passed And I input my last name....................................................passed And I choose my city province...............................................passed And I check terms & conditions policy agreement.............................passed And I click register button.................................................passed Then I should directed to OTP option page...................................passed And I see two options to sent OTP, SMS or WhatsApp..........................passed
